complying with any new or revised financial
accounting standards provided pursuant to
Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. ☐

Item 5.03. Amendments to Articles of
Incorporation or Bylaws; Change in Fiscal
Year.
On January 18, 2022, Morgan
Stanley (the “Registrant”) filed a Certificate
of Elimination (the “Certificate of
Elimination”) with the Secretary
of State of the State of Delaware to eliminate
its Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative
Preferred Stock, Series H (the “Series
H Preferred Stock”), which was redeemed by the
Registrant on January 18, 2022. The
Certificate of Elimination (a) eliminated the
previous designation of 52,000 shares of
Series H Preferred Stock, none of which were
outstanding at the time of filing, (b) upon
such
elimination, caused such shares of Series H
Preferred Stock to resume their status as
undesignated shares of preferred stock of the
Registrant,
and (c) eliminated from the Amended and
Restated Certificate of Incorporation of the
Registrant all references to the Series H
Preferred
Stock. A copy of the Certificate of
Elimination is filed as Exhibit 3.1 to this
Current Report on Form 8-K and is incorporated
herein
by reference.
